mapper.select: SELECT date_format(dia.diagnosis_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS diagnosisDate, dia.diagnosis_symptom AS diagnosisSymptom, ah.animal_hospital_name AS animalHospitalName FROM diagnosis AS dia JOIN animalhospital AS ah ON dia.seq_animal_hospital = ah.seq_animal_hospital WHERE dia.seq_doctor = 1 AND dia.seq_animal = 1 ORDER BY dia.diagnosis_date DESC

SELECT seq_animal as seqAnimal, seq_protector as seqProtector, animal_name AS animalName, animal_type AS animalType, animal_size AS animalSize, (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y') - DATE_FORMAT(animal_age, '%y')) AS animalAge, (case when animal_gender = 0 then 'Male' else 'Female' END) AS animalGender, animal_weight AS animalWeight, animal_important_symptom as animalImportantSymptom FROM animal WHERE seq_animal = #{seqAnimal}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Diagnosis (seq_doctor, seq_animal, seq_protector, seq_medicine, seq_animal_hospital, diagnosis_date, diagnosis_symptom, diagnosis_update_date, medicine_update_date )VALUES ( 1, #{seqAnimal}, #{seqProtector}, 1, 1, now(), #{diagnosisSymptom}, now(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE Protector SET protector_important_point = #{protectorImportantPoint}, protector_update_date = now() WHERE seq_protector = #{seqProtector}
mapper.select: SELECT medicine_name as medicineName, medicine_detail_name as medicineDetailName, medicinemedication_guide as medicinemedicationGuide FROM Medicine WHERE seq_medicine = 2
